verses.text:
The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Hadrach|strong="H2317"\w*, and \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* thereof: when the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, as of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add shall be\add* toward the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* also shall \w border|strong="H1379"\w* thereby; \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, and \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, though it be \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*.

And \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w* did \w build|strong="H1129"\w* herself a strong \w hold|strong="H4692"\w*, and heaped \w up|strong="H6651"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* as the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and fine \w gold|strong="H2742"\w* as the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w* of the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

Behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* will cast her \w out|strong="H3423"\w*, and he will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* her \w power|strong="H2428"\w* in the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and she shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*; \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* also \add shall see it\add*, and be \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w sorrowful|strong="H2342"\w*, and \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*; for her \w expectation|strong="H4007"\w* shall be \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w* shall not be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

And a \w bastard|strong="H4464"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*, and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And I will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* out of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and his \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* from between his \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*: but he that \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w*, even he, \add shall be\add* for our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and he shall be as a \w governor|strong="H0441"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* as a \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*.\f + \fr 9.7 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

And I will \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* about mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* because of the \w army|strong="H4675"\w*, because of him that passeth \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, and because of him that \w returneth|strong="H7725"\w*: and no \w oppressor|strong="H5065"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* them any more: for now have I \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* with mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

¶ \w Rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: behold, thy \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee: he \add is\add* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, and having \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w*; \w lowly|strong="H6041"\w*, and \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and upon a \w colt|strong="H5895"\w* the \w foal|strong="H1121"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*.\f + \fr 9.9 \ft having…: or, saving himself\f*

And I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* from \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: and he shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* unto the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*: and his \w dominion|strong="H4915"\w* \add shall be\add* from \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \add even\add* to \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \add even\add* to the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

As for thee also, by the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* I have sent \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w* out of the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w* wherein \add is\add* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft by…: or, whose covenant is by blood\f*

¶ \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* you to the strong \w hold|strong="H1225"\w*, ye \w prisoners|strong="H0615"\w* of \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*: even to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* do I \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add that\add* I will \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* unto thee;

When I have \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* for me, \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* with \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and raised \w up|strong="H5782"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, O \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, against thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, O \w Greece|strong="H3120"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* thee as the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* over them, and his \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* as the \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*: and the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with \w whirlwinds|strong="H5591"\w* of the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* shall \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* them; and they shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w subdue|strong="H3533"\w* with \w sling|strong="H7050"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*; and they shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \add and\add* make a \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* as through \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; and they shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* like \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*, \add and\add* as the \w corners|strong="H2106"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.\f + \fr 9.15 \ft with…: or, the stones of the sling\f*\f + \fr 9.15 \ft be…: or, fill both the bowls, etc\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* as the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for they \add shall be as\add* the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of a \w crown|strong="H5145"\w*, lifted up as an \w ensign|strong="H5264"\w* upon his \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

For how great \add is\add* his \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*, and how great \add is\add* his \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*! \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* shall make the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w cheerful|strong="H5107"\w*, and new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* the \w maids|strong="H1330"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft cheerful: or, grow, or, speak\f*
